Baked Lemon Pudding

Baked Lemon Pudding

serves 4 to 6

Curried Cheese Straws

Leftover pastry

Roll pastry flat and sprinkle with cheese and curry power. Fold in half and re-roll. Cut into straws, twist, and bake at 400F for ten minutes.

Grated cheddar cheese

Curry
